texts: Transport for London (TfL) will shortly be launching its 2008 graduate recruitment scheme.
The organisation has been voted by graduates across the UK as one of the Top 100 employers in the Times' Graduate Employer of Choice awards.
With graduate schemes in 14 different, company-wide disciplines, TfL is this year supporting more than 100 new graduate trainees who are starting careers in their chosen professions.
The scheme offers a wide range of options for successful applicants including positions in management, engineering, IT, finance or transport planning.
Find out more at TfL's Graduate Open Day
If you want to find out more about the TfL's graduate opportunities in 2008, visit the team at Glaziers Hall, 9 Montague Close, London Bridge, SE1 on October 5 between 11am and 3pm.
